flawed_nl_solution:
On the first day, she will do 10 push-ups.
On the second day, she will do 10 + 5 = <<10+5=17>>17 push-ups.
On the third day, she will do 17 + 5 = <<17+5=22>>22 push-ups.
So, Geli will do a total of 10 + 17 + 22 = <<10+17+22=49>>49 push-ups in a week.
#### 49

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 17. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
